task.title: How to create custom roles
task.shortdesc: Here you will get instructions about how to create custom roles.

taskbody.prereq:
To successfully create custom roles:
You must be logged into the application.
Must have admin-level access to create and manage roles and permissions.

step.cmd: Go to Roles > Create New Role.
Set permissions (e.g., view only, no delete access).

example.p: Freelancers see only their tasks, can't modify others, and can’t view sensitive documents—perfect for working with contractors securely.
